remarks: Lemma for ~ nmpar .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmpar.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nmpar.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
nmpar.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
nmpar.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nmpar.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
nmpar.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
nmpar.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
nmpar.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. CPreHil ) $.
nmpar.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
nmpar.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
nmparlem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( N ` ( A .+ B ) ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) ) ) $.
